pkgmetadata.longdescription: # pkce (Proof Key for Code Exchange)Simple Python module to generate PKCE code verifier and code challenge.## Installation```bashpip install pkce```## Usage```python>>> import pkce>>> code_verifier, code_challenge = pkce.generate_pkce_pair()``````python>>> import pkce>>> code_verifier = pkce.generate_code_verifier(length=128)>>> code_challenge = pkce.get_code_challenge(code_verifier)```## Additional informationSpec for the PKCE protocol can be found [here](https://tools.ietf.org/html/rfc7636).
